biggie mom lets say there are many times i looked and saw reflections of my son i argued sometimes consulted; i saw results and said well done.  i thought of him constantly and silently asked why i tried fervently and just cannot say goodbye  i lived with visions twined and twisted passion so cold and withered thoughts battered and shattered i dreamed dreams cherished memories housed friendship and promises that mattered  in the end time is treasured; but love for my son its everlasting
